attributes.action: Pass legislation dictating that no council may introduce annual rises in council tax higher than the rate of inflation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Annual council tax rises by unsustainable in that they rise each year at a rate higher than the rate of inflation, and thereby are unaffordable, and become less affordable each year. When civil service, and public sector wage rises are usually dictated to follow the prevalant rate of inflation, the annual 'above inflation' rises in council tax are therefore unsustainable
